content:
{
  "stage": "Assign",
  "orchestrator": "engine",
  "assignments": [
    {
      "order": 1,
      "task_id": "task_1",
      "name": "Generate Code",
      "executor": "workers/developer.generateCode",
      "params": {
        "spec": "specification details here"
      },
      "timeout_ms": 30000,
      "retries": 0,
      "artifacts_in": [],
      "artifacts_out": ["diff"],
      "validations": []
    },
    {
      "order": 2,
      "task_id": "task_2",
      "name": "Modify Files",
      "executor": "workers/developer.modifyFiles",
      "params": {
        "edits": "edit details here"
      },
      "timeout_ms": 60000,
      "retries": 0,
      "artifacts_in": ["diff"],
      "artifacts_out": ["applied"],
      "validations": []
    },
    {
      "order": 3,
      "task_id": "task_3",
      "name": "Orchestrate Decision",
      "executor": "workers/interact.orchestrate",
      "params": {
        "decision": "decision details here",
        "context": "context details here"
      },
      "timeout_ms": 30000,
      "retries": 0,
      "artifacts_in": [],
      "artifacts_out": ["success", "action", "data"],
      "validations": []
    },
    {
      "order": 4,
      "task_id": "task_4",
      "name": "Detect Image",
      "executor": "workers/vision.detect",
      "params": {
        "image": "image path here",
        "query": "query details here",
        "annotate": true,
        "outPath": "output path here",
        "threshold": 0.5
      },
      "timeout_ms": 60000,
      "retries": 0,
      "artifacts_in": [],
      "artifacts_out": ["coords", "score", "annotated_path"],
      "validations": []
    }
  ]
}
